caption.p: Study area and study sites for the collection of Ae. aegypti mosquitoes in the Lower Rio Grande Valley and San Antonio using AGO and BGS2 traps in 2017 to 2018. The map was made using QGIS 3.4.4 ( https://qgis.org/en/site/). Map data: Google Maps, and with publicly available administrative boundaries ( https://gadm.org/license.html)
